text: The District Secretary () is a 1942 Soviet drama movie directed by Ivan Pyryev.Секретарь райкома (1942) It stars Vasili Vanin, Marina Ladynina, and Viktor Kulakov. == Actors == * Vasili Vanin as District Secretary Stepan Gavrilovich Kochet * Marina Ladynina as Natasha * Viktor Kulakov as Lt. Herman Albrecht, alias Lt. Orlov * Mikhail Astangov as Nazi Col. Makenau * Boris Poslavsky as Semyen Abramovich Rotman * Mikhail Kuznetsov as Sasha Rusov == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1942 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Ivan Pyryev
title: The District Secretary
